name: 詹姆斯·海托华
name_full: 詹姆斯·海托华 James Hightower
introduction: James Hightower is a Brooklyn based actor and graduate of the Atlantic Acting School. He is an avid lover and participant in downtown, DIY theatre and devised, collaborative work. Recent Projects: Inventing Anna, Stuck!, Those Who Can't. James is co-creator of the podcast Mixed Emotions, a series in which he and his sister dissect their experience growing up and navigating life as mixed-race Americans.
